website_summaries.verdict: For the money, the TG Champion is a great buy. It's quiet, durable, and the darts can be removed easily. It's a good, all-around dartboard.
pros: Attractive color scheme for high visibility
The bull's-eye is staple-free to reduce bounce-outs
The sisal makes for quiet play and darts are easily removed
cons: Some reports of missing or bulging sisal or misplaced numbers

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed since it got pretty good reviews
customer_reviews.text: The rim is dented and the paint on the rim is chipped. It looks used, not brand new. It is poorly made; I am disappointed since it got pretty good reviews. The only reason I am not returning it is because it's so heavy and I don't want to pay for shipping again. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leila E. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Terrible board
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, lasted less than 4 months of moderate use. Holes never really closed up. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: no mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: very surprising to receive board with instruction but without mounting hardware. it is a bit confusing and inconvenient as i need to make a trip to Home Depot and think how to substitute bracket and leveling solution. i feel like next time i need to buy more expensive but better equipped board. it is sad to see too many bounce-backs, percentage pretty high and it directly translates into need of replacing damaged or broken darts.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I like that there is no writing around the edge, so it will always look great, even after rotating the outside ring and the dartboard to even out the wear. The price was great, and the quality is top-notch. The three adhesive feet worked perfectly to make the dartboard completely stable in my cabinet (see photo). I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value "Bristle" board
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased over a dozen dartboards from Amazon. This is my favorite. Best quality "Bristle" board under $25. Comes with hanging brackets, easy to install for anyone who is familiar with traditional dart boards. You can spend more money but unless you're hosting weekly tournaments this one is perfect for a homeowner. I especially like it because I put them in custom handmade cabinets. These have no extra brand names or writing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality! Sign of USED board
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered one and had sign of used board and also the border look scratchy and not smooth at all! I placed an replacement and AGAIN I have received the duplicate of what I originally ordered. And I am tired of dropping it back to UPS to return!!!! Not worth your money. Pay couple bucks more for a better product
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: Not self-healing
customer_reviews.text: I expected this dart board to be self-healing, meaning the holes close up after removing the darts, like my 20 year old bristle dartboard did. The only reason I replaced my original dartboard is because the wiring was getting pretty wrecked from years of use. After just a few games on the new dart board, the board itself looked like it had been used for years with every single hole from the dart tip gaping.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hogan

customer_reviews.title: This board is heavy duty !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the more expensive board and it was amazing! super thick and built extremely well. This will be used for an outdoor portable dart board that we've built and I have zero worries about this board being able to hold up outside. The mounting was a bit wimpy as I believe it was only a few screws ( I could have missed something) but it will definitely hold up with no problems. the color was spot on, some other reviews said theirs was yellow, maybe they purchased a different version but mine is white. numbers and metal boarders are in the correct spot. Overall a very nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nicolette hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality - Not Worth The Money - Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: This board is horrible, darts leave gaping holes, does not heal, so darts constantly drop off the board which makes game play very frustrating. Turned around and spent a little more money for a better quality board.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Leah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and solid 😁
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dart board... haven't had it long, but I'm pleased with the ease of install and it looks great with surrounding protection. For the price I would definitely recommend if you don't want to pay too much.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a cork board
customer_reviews.text: I had this cork board for several years that I had never set up. Then I did and within a month it looked awful, flaking. I remembered these brush boards and replaced the cork one, looks great and has stood up very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs a Dart Board
customer_reviews.text: Y'all need one of these. Great for having friends over. You can also buy the dart board protector on Amazon. And the darts. One quick stop shop! Well made, good strong and study easy to hang. Perfect for games night.
customer_reviews.author: Lakewaylass

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Ideal for beginners in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The board doesn’t hold lighter darts in well after a bit of use. The bullseye is pretty much worn down more than half the way but thankfully we have a set of heavier darts. Next time I would spend a little more for a better board.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Pham

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: This board may look like the more expensive ones, but it is not! I only had it for one month with casual use by my mom and me. It was never self-healing as they claimed. The large staples seem to attract the dart tips more than you would imagine. Spend a little more upfront and you will be happier in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bell

customer_reviews.title: Dart board
customer_reviews.text: Love this dart board. Havent played in years and didnt buy the wall protector need to get one. One of the wires had been messed up in shipping from a hole in the packaging but was an easy fix so i didnt need to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Doss

customer_reviews.title: Get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: The boards web couldn't hold up more then a month. I shot alot of darts I like to shoot 6 at a time and after 1 month the web is beat up pretty bad. I recently got a viper ain 360 and I have had this board for about a month now and it holding up just fine the web is just as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: francis

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good. Bice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Standard board. Looks and feels good. Bice and heavy. Sadly, though, the major downfall is the bristle board itself. Using steel darts. After 2 games, it looks beat to hell as holes arent closing up (im no expert, but usually a bristle board is 'packed' so that holes close up giving the board longer life). I dont expect to get many games out of this, but for VERY infrequent players or more display, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Donze

customer_reviews.title: Dart Gone Good Board
customer_reviews.text: It's a dart board that one can throw darts at and if properly thrown stick in the board. That's about it. Sometimes one get a red centered bullseye, but not often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twice arrived dirty and used
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived in original packaging from China, filthy and with dart holes in it. I returned it and tried to request that the replacement be inspected before sending to me. The replacement arrived again in original packaging and dirty with what appear to be water stains and dart holes in it!! You get what you pay for I guess. I am keeping and using the second one out of frustration, but I would not buy this brand of dartboard again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It's fine... did not include darts
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is pretty nice for the price, but definitely not worth more than that. I received this with a few dents and the board was pulling away from the outer 'frame' piece in some places. Also, it seemed that some of the numbers were upside down. If you're just looking for a decent dartboard that works well with steel tip darts, this is it. But if you're looking for something a bit nicer or fancier, get something else. Also, I did not receive darts with this board as it seems other reviewers did.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: No darts included
customer_reviews.text: I assumed darts would be included and price dropped significantly after I ordered...not happy with this purchase..should of read the reviews more carefully
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it if you play a lot
customer_reviews.text: Good in the beginning but for minimal use. After a few parties it begins loosening up and the darts fall out. Wire is also rounded and causes a ton of bounce outs which ruin your darts. Spend the extra money and get a better packed board and angles wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny V

customer_reviews.title: Staples in the board.. Pictures lie
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the third photo fool you.. This board has staples in it..unlike the third picture which is compeletly misleading. It's a cheap board so you get what you pay for but if you want a board without the staples, THIS IS NOT IT
customer_reviews.author: Jromey

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to use it in your apartment
customer_reviews.text: The dartboard must be wall-mounted and doesn't even come with darts :/. Felt like a rip off especially since I couldn't hang it in my apartment due to a no-nailing policy. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Obama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good board. No smells from dye
customer_reviews.text: Nice board. The holes do not self conform. But love it for a game with my hubby. No smells from dye. No problems hanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve been better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s gift from Santa. I should have opened it before Christmas Eve and checked it out. There was paint flaking from the metal edges in two areas. If I’d had more time, I would’ve returned it. Hopefully mine is just a fluke but I guess I’ll never know.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Z

customer_reviews.title: Ehh... Already replaced it once
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a replacement as the first one I received was missing a number. The second had a huge gouge in the bristle. I had to remove the number ring from the replacement to put on my original to get the best out of the two. I haven't put it on my wall yet and he bristle is already bulging in some spots. You get what you pay for I guess. Next time I would spend an extra $10 on a viper or something nicer. Made in China. Comes in a blank brown box. Hopefully it will last at least a year. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Magdziarz

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this board that guarantees no bounce out. The thick wiring on this board causes a ton of down shaft and frustration. I was so happy with my new board arrived and I was able to get rid of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnmlb

customer_reviews.title: horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about 8 months ago and the thing is literally disintegrating now. Attached a picture of it, but after a while the numbers just start coming apart and there are holes in the triple 20 now. The positive is that it's dirt cheap so I didn't waste a ton of money on this mistake, but man, you get what you pay for with a dart board. Better go to an actual dart supply site for this kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: will landymore

customer_reviews.title: For beginners and pros...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT, PERFECT, PERFECT ! If it was a little cheaper, it'd be EVEN MORE perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Blaydese

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected... I thought it came with darts but it’s great either way.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: OK value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Entry level board. Doesn’t ‘heal’ well in comparison to more expensive, competition-quality boards.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift for our teenage son, but it quickly became a family fun time! This dart board is very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CLRStrong

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The numbers are a little funky only comes with two screws for hanging it but it’s not half bad for young adults and such
customer_reviews.author: Krista Noorman

customer_reviews.title: I read the poor reviews, but...
customer_reviews.text: The board is perfect, installs in minutes. You need to supply wall anchors if you don't hit stud, but I seem to have thousands of those... I also used longer screws to make sure the anchors expand, but this is not necessary... If you don't have the anchors, either go buy some or hit the studs. Hours of play and board remains perfect... For the money, no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a functional dartboard at any level of play
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made with cheap materials. Darts won’t stick in the bullseye even after sharpening. Darts fallout on their own on areas outside the bullseye. Junk. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: terry l. downs

customer_reviews.title: Great dart board for amateurs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter set. Easy to assemble. I recommend adding Extra support nails on the bottom. Hanger and cork backing not too stable.
customer_reviews.author: Funktastick

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Very well made, heavy duty material. Very pleased,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: we play a lot and it is holding up perfect
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product you will be unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Darts won’t stick into board , they bounce out all the time or slowly fall out Board material seems dry and cracked Price was good but product made from poor quality materials
customer_reviews.author: TC Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, husband bought a dart board also. This one much nicer. We returned the one he bought
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great board, fun to play
customer_reviews.text: We just put this up a few days ago. Seems like a great board. My teens love it. The darts seem to sink right in, but without ruining the board. Fun game-room addition. Recommend: put up a large piece of thin plywood behind the board and you'll save your wall from endless peltings from missed shots - unless you're a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the "man cave" we love it very sturdy well made
customer_reviews.author: D. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not thorough and difficult putting up.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions was not thorough and very difficult time putting it up. Honestly it's still not up right on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again....
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, especially for the price. The wires are angled so your dart slides to the left or right instead on bending and eventually breaking it. Bristle part seems to be holding up okay.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great board for price!
customer_reviews.text: As often as we use our board, we will probably end up needing another one. It’s great durability. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: LilyX

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product for the quasi-beginner basement game room
customer_reviews.text: The board seems to be very solid and has taken a "beating" well from two teenagers playing (and getting better) at darts each day. So it is receiving a lot of use each evening. I can not speak to any professional level of quality vs. actual competition boards - but this does the trick and is providing evening entertainment that is not computer based.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Just what my son wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Fit's great onto the wall (my husband mounted it onto a cork board) in the hallway for them to play.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Weinacker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Mounts great, I mounted it on brick outside my house and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality.
customer_reviews.text: This works for a dart board, but the quality is definitely lacking. The metal numbers are hard to read and the metal wire is pulling up.
customer_reviews.author: Farmtotable3

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, good looking board.
customer_reviews.text: This board looks great out of the box. Once you start playing with it, you notice that the holes don't heal very well. I've had it about a month now, playing only occasionally and the board shows visible signs of wear. Also, the wires cause a lot of bounces.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Leek

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware this board does not self heal at all. Looks terrible after a month of play. You get what you pay for I guess. Would not buy again but not totally dissatisfied. Unlike other negative reviews the bullseye was fine on mine.
customer_reviews.author: East NC

customer_reviews.title: Great Dartboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful dartboard. I am very pleased with this. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart989

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dart board
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what we had and needed a replacement. Product is what it is
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is great quality but alas it was too big for the cabinet
customer_reviews.author: michael smith

customer_reviews.title: Where are my darts? - Description for item not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Where are my darts? There are none in the box. I read in the comments for the dart board that darts are included but the description does not say anything about darts.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sylvia, PhD, CNS, LDN

customer_reviews.title: Messed up numbers but ok
customer_reviews.text: Numbers a bit confusing but hope to spend many hours playing darts.
customer_reviews.author: Ntj007

customer_reviews.title: Good dart board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good dart board for the price, but as soon as I opened it I wish I'd paid the extra $15-20 to get one without the big wires. It's held up great so far, no complaints with this board considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Golden

customer_reviews.title: Does not match description
customer_reviews.text: The dart board didn't seem like bad quality but I am returning because it did not match description. The wires around the bullseye do not look like the pictures on Amazon. The description stated that the bullseye had no stables. The one I received had multiple stables around the bullseye.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but the darts sometimes don't stick
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price but the darts sometimes don't stick. If you're a pro go for something else but if you're like me and you just like to chill and relax throwing some darts in the man cave, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest CustomerTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Board is okay, but is not holding up well. A few solid nights of playing and already sections are breaking down, despite being proactive in turning the numbers. Is NOT self-healing as described.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Good product for your money
customer_reviews.text: Good product very heavy I got the more expensive one this is good for your home or for a get together says for the bored I got it was to be self healing doesn't seem to do that well but over all good product for your money
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Quality Board at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of this board for the price - GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.author: SarahJane

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than newer style boards
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this in our man cave in our basement. Looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Will Slaven

customer_reviews.title: Dart board
customer_reviews.text: I would of gave a five but it came a little messed up. The wire was not right. But other than that my husband loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for less money. Does what it has to do and makes fun
customer_reviews.author: Isa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Thick board and very sturdy! I would recommend this board to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price!! It's definitely a solid dart board.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine01

customer_reviews.title: Does this come with darts or not?
customer_reviews.text: I understood this came with two sets of darts???? They were not in the package. The product reviews said they came with two sets????
customer_reviews.author: AK Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Order darts separately! it doesn't come with any.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones in the bars. Pretty great. I don't think it's cork, but it looks very similar. Side note - order darts separately if you plan to play with the board when it arrives. It doesn't come with darts.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Graebner

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and worked perfect for the project I completed. It is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Maddi C

customer_reviews.title: Good Blend of Price/Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to buy a dartboard online but have thoroughly enjoyed my TG Champion! I dont have my dartboard in a cabinet or mount so I cannot comment on any issues there, but it has held up through many parties and game nights and I would recommend the product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Cole Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: This isn't bad but the darr holes dont close up like they should. There are better boards for just a little bit more
customer_reviews.author: cody abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a street party. Darts stuck well. Heavy-duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Time6

customer_reviews.title: Good board, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This dart board is good for the price. It is a real board, not cheap cork or the plastic type dart board. Installation was a breeze and darts stick nicely. For a home board for casual use, this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: APS

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved it. It was a little dented on top ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved it. It was a little dented on top but he didn't care he said no one was going to see it when it was hung up.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: If u play a lot DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I was expecting The dart holes DO NOT seal back up Poor quality made to look like a good quality board but it’s not
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Heavily painted - doesn't self heal dart holes
customer_reviews.text: The heavy paint used on this dart board means that dart holes don't self heal. Professional boards seem to be dyed instead of slathered with paint (I'm not expert, just my observation). I've used it for a few weeks now and it's riddled with very visible dart holes all over. On the plus-side, the metal straps are beveled and do reduce bounce outs. In fact I haven't had any legit bounce outs yet.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Mullins

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Super impressed with the quality I think I paid $15 and it feels heavy and high quality! Very happy consumer!
customer_reviews.author: Celina W.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to our champing fun. Great quality, will enjoy for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Clem

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for a friend. Wasn't sure what to expect as the price was so reasonable, but I was EXTREMELY and PLEASANTLY surprised! Great quality and great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A Wallrath

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good material and dense. Perfect dart board. Will be enjoyed by all.
customer_reviews.author: Dom22

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, solid, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I stuck this on my wall with some heavy 3m strips. Hasn't budged. The board has held up over probably 100+ games by now and the darts still stick just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: good board
customer_reviews.text: The black parts are a little off color,kind of dark grey.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Lund

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent board. Great construction, perfect mounting brackets. I can tell this will last for a good while. Best value!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson D. Kugle

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent board for someone that will rarely play or just wants a man cave look but doesn’t actually throw darts. The fiber appears to have no quality control and the stapled wires are a huge letdown. There were voids and holes in the bullseye when I received my board and I immediately scheduled a return of the item. Take your money elsewhere if you want a decent board.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I received this dartboard in very poor condition looking worn and of very poor quality not to mention it didn't even come with darts but came with instructions on how to play very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a fundraiser. I was relieved when I got it because it wasn't cheap looking at all. It was actually really heavy and almost looked rustic/old. I would definitely but this again for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the shipping box only- not in it's own box and the paint around the edges was chipping off. Immediately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mad4Mod

customer_reviews.title: Great for any player.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect dartboard, no frills, but has everything as needed for a robust game.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sutterfield

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good instructions, no problems
customer_reviews.text: The board was as expected. There were hanging instructions, the screws were all present, and it went up without any issue (at least issues caused by the product). Using it periodically I can't see any reason to suspect it won't last for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son used his old dart board until he wore it out. Gave him this one as a gift to replace the old one. This is a sturdy replacement that will stand up to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: cccladyy

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: The board is good enough. The triangle wire is SO obtrusive that darts bounce off at a jarringly high rate which is disappointing. With a simple manufacturing fix to blade dividers this board could be great.
customer_reviews.author: justin c

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality Board at Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm no professional dart player, but I have certainly played my fair share among friends. Finally purchased my own board and found the TG champion to have good reviews and within a fair price point. This dart board is a quality piece, especially for the price. Material is consistent across the whole board and holds darts nicely. I suggest this board if you are looking for a decent quality set at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy board that delivers when playing darts
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy board that delivers when playing darts, allowing almost no darts bouncing out. Installation was easier adding to my existing dart board case made more than 15 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but its an easy fix with more tacs
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hard tip darts and it works as expected. The only issue is that the metal frame sometimes comes undone, but its an easy fix with more tacs. The mounting with the hardware was easy and hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner
customer_reviews.text: Improve your marriage and get a game like this for your house. This board is durable, just be sure to protect the wall behind it with another product.
customer_reviews.author: LyndiB

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP in every sens of the term. And darts were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Vicassidy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality board. Numbers could be better done but it's legible.
customer_reviews.author: T_woot

customer_reviews.title: This is a great board for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board for the price. My only complaint is the easy open packaging that was in the description... it was so easy to open that it was open when it arrived - downside is that there was no mounting parts so had to make-do w/ my own ingenuity.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

product_meta.title: Bristle Dart Board, Tournament Sized Indoor Hanging Number Target Game for Steel Tip Darts- Dartboard with Mounting Hardware by Hey! Play!
product_meta.description: Bring your favorite bar game home with the competition quality of this Bristle Dartboard Target Game by Hey! Play! The fiber of this bristle board delivers a good stick for steel-tip darts, the mark of a top-grade dart board. This board also features quick-repair technology and an enhanced spider wire dividing system, providing more target scoring coverage and less bounce outs! SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Hey! Play! is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Hey! Play! and ONLY Bristle Dartboard Indoor Target Game by Hey! Play! are GUARANTEED to be genuine. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products.
feature_bullets: QUALITY BUILD– This dartboard is able to fit into most dart cabinets and is made of an enhanced self-healing bristle construction, proving to be more durable than cork or wound paper boards when used with steel-tipped darts.

MULTIPLE GAMES- All varieties of your favorite bar games are playable on this bristle dartboard, including cricket, Shanghai, Around the Clock, and more! This dart board is great for those learning to play or to impress even the most advanced players!

SCORING ADVANTAGE– This board has a staple-free frame and bull’s eye and spider wire dividers- reducing dart deflection for a good shot. Similar to those used in tournament/professional games, this prevents bounce outs for excellent scoring potential!

FUN FOR ALL– This regulation size dartboard features vibrant colors with an easy-to-read number ring scoring system divided into 20 equal target sections for fun and accurate competition, perfect for adults, teens, and older kids of all skill levels.

PRODUCT DETAILS–  Board Size: 18” diameter, 1.60” depth. Bristle construction self-heals after use. Standard wire spider designed dividers isolate each bed. Includes wall mounting hardware for hanging and game instructions.
